title: Trump praises Greece’s ‘courage’ for opposing net-zero shipping deal
summary_full: Athens broke ranks with the EU to help the White House sink a global agreement to cut emissions from maritime traffic
summary_public: Athens broke ranks with the EU to help the White House sink a global agreement to cut emissions from maritime traffic

GR.label: negative
